    F-Gas and ODS Regulations (CPD)

    About this course:

    This is an entry level course that provides essential knowledge for anyone working in the Air Conditioning and Refrigeration industry or those that are responsible for managing F-Gas compliance.

    Duration: 1/2 day (3hrs CPD)

    On completion of this course delegates should be able to:

    • Know the current F-Gas / ODS regulations and legislative requirements
    • Apply the legal obligations to AC & R system owners, operators & maintenance personnel
    • Create ACR system registers, F-Gas records and reporting requirements
    • Calculate the equivalent CO2 level for refrigerants
    • Implement RAC system leak testing plans
    • Identify further training requirements for service personnel

    Learning Agenda:

    1. Environmental Issues
    2. F-Gas and ODS Regulations
    3. Indirect Leak checking
    4. Recording and Reporting
